name: airplane
title: Airplane
description: Just like on iPhone, turn off the wireless features on your macOS anytime.
author: pradeepb28

commands.name: turn-airplane-mode-on
commands.title: Turn Airplane On
commands.description: This command disable wireless technology such as WiFi and Bluetooth.

commands.name: turn-airplane-mode-off
commands.title: Turn Airplane Off
commands.description: This command enable wireless technology such as WiFi and Bluetooth.
